name: sabloger/php-strict
description: If you want PHP much clearer you'll be happy with Php-Strict! If you need a way to pass packed arguments to functions you'll be happy with Php-Strict! If you need a way to validate arguments and get rid of exceptions and data-misses on invalid arguments you'll be happy with Php-Strict! If you want a strict-typed ArrayList like Java and other strict-typed languages you'll be happy with Php-Strict!
